name: Space Shooter Prototype (sunsetworld)
description:
Space Shooter Prototype.

So, this is a (somewhat broken) prototype of a game of a shooter I was trying to make. I followed this tutorial to make the game, however, I remade all of the sprites: https://www.udemy.com/course/be-a-game-maker-with-gamemaker-studio-2/.

The reason it's broken is because of the enemy AI.

The controls are as follows:

Right Mouse: Move.

Left Mouse: Shoot.

(Tip: Move immediately). 

How it (was supposed to) fit the theme: I was going to link together 2 different styles, western shooter and a sci-fi space theme.
